Package stocker.controller

Class StockerControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • stocker.controller.StockerControl
  • public class StockerControl
extends java.lang.Object
    The main controller of the Stocker application. Responsible for startup, shutdown, properties and session management. All data-related communication is outsourced to the StockerDataManager.
    Author:
    Marc S. Schneider

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      StockerControl()
      Construct a new StockerControl instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StockerControl

        public StockerControl()
        Construct a new StockerControl instance. Reads the properties, intializes data manager and main frame and restores the previous session.

    • Method Detail

      • getFrame

        public StockerFrame getFrame()
        Get the main frame of this application
        Returns:
        the main frame (a StockerFrame)

      • getActiveDataProvider

        public int getActiveDataProvider()
        Get the number of the currently active data provider from the properties.
        Returns:
        the index of the currently active data provider, w.r.t. the order that they are defined in the properties

      • setActiveDataProvider

        public void setActiveDataProvider​(int prov)
        Set currently active data provider (in the properties) to the given number
        Parameters:
        prov - the index of the data provider to be set active, w.r.t. the order that they are defined in the properties

      • readProperties

        public void readProperties​(java.lang.String filepath)
        Reads the properties for this application from a Json file at the given disk location into the internal property JsonObject.
        Parameters:
        filepath - the path to the properties file, including file name and file extension

      • writeProperties

        public void writeProperties​(java.lang.String filepath)
        Writes the properties for this application from the internal JsonObject into a Json file on the disk.
        Parameters:
        filepath - the path to the properties file, including file name and file extension

      • initializeProperties

        public void initializeProperties()
        Creates a new properties file with default values.

      • getPullURL

        public java.lang.String getPullURL()
        Get the URL that is required for pull requests at the current data provider (as contained in the properties).
        Returns:
        the URL for pull requests

      • getPushURL

        public java.lang.String getPushURL()
        Get the URL that is required for push subscriptions at the current data provider (as contained in the properties).
        Returns:
        the URL for push subscritions

      • getAPIToken

        public java.lang.String getAPIToken()
        Get the API token for authentication at the current data provider (as contained in the properties).
        Returns:
        the token for authentication at the data provider

      • saveSession

        public void saveSession​(java.lang.String name)
        Saves the session as it currently is into the session list (a JsonObject). A session contains all window positions and sizes and all information required to restore the currently shown data.
        Parameters:
        name - the name with which this session should be saved

      • saveCurrentSession

        public java.lang.String saveCurrentSession()
        Saves the session as it currently is, with name of the currently active session, into the session list (a JsonObject). A session contains all window positions and sizes and all information required to restore the currently shown data.
        Returns:
        the name of the current session

      • restoreSession

        public void restoreSession​(java.lang.String sessionName)
        Restores the session to the state that was saved under the given name. The session data is read from this applications JsonObject for sessions, which has likely been read previously from a Json file using readSessions(String). A session contains all window positions and sizes and all information required to restore the currently shown data.
        Parameters:
        sessionName - the name of the session to be restored

      • removeCurrentSession

        public java.lang.String removeCurrentSession()
        Removes the session which is currently active from the internal session list (so it will no longer be saved and can no longer be restored).
        Returns:
        the name of the current session which has just been removed

      • resetSession

        public void resetSession()
        Resets the current session, i.e. closes all open charts and clears the watchlist.

      • verifySessionName

        public boolean verifySessionName​(java.lang.String name)
        Determines whether the given name is acutally a session name.
        Parameters:
        name - the session name to be verified
        Returns:
        true if it is the name of an actual session, false otherwise

      • getSessionCount

        public int getSessionCount()
        Returns the number of currently defined sessions.
        Returns:
        the number of currently defined sessions

      • getCurrentSessionName

        public java.lang.String getCurrentSessionName()
        Returns the name of the currently active session.
        Returns:
        the name of the currently active session

      • showSearchDialog

        public void showSearchDialog()
        Open a search dialog.

      • showSettingsDialog

        public void showSettingsDialog()
        Open a properties dialog.

      • searchStocks

        public void searchStocks​(java.lang.String query,
                         ISearchDataReceiver dr)
        Put a query for a stock to the data provider. Communication is done non-blocking, so this method does not return a value, but instead will call back the provided ISearchDataReceiver as soon as the search result is ready.
        Parameters:
        query - the search string
        dr - the receiver which will be notified and handed over the search result as soon as it is available

      • getPlotData

        public void getPlotData​(ChartWatchItem w)
                 throws StockerDataManagerException
        Pulls plot data according to the properties of the provider ChartWatchItem, and writes the result into the same ChartWatchItem.
        Parameters:
        w - the ChartWatchItem which contains information about the data to be pulled; the result will be written into that same ChartWatchItem
        Throws:
        StockerDataManagerException

      • getQuote

        public void getQuote​(WatchlistItem w)
              throws StockerDataManagerException
        Get a quote from the data provider for the provided WatchlistItem.
        Parameters:
        w - the WatchlistItem to be quoted; the result will be written into that same ChartWatchItem
        Throws:
        StockerDataManagerException

      • addChartListenerToDataManager

        public void addChartListenerToDataManager​(StockerChart c)
        Add a StockerChart to the data manager's list of listeners (which will be notified in the case of a relevant data change).
        Parameters:
        c - the StockerChart to be added as a listener

      • removeChartListenerFromDataManager

        public void removeChartListenerFromDataManager​(StockerChart c)
        Remove a StockerChart from the data manager's list of listeners (which will be notified in the case of a relevant data change).
        Parameters:
        c - the StockerChart to be removed from the list of listeners

      • addWatchlistListenerToDataManager

        public void addWatchlistListenerToDataManager​(Watchlist w)
        Adds a Watchlist to the data manager's list of listeners (which will be notified in the case of a relevant data change).
        Parameters:
        w - the Watchlist to be added as a listener

      • isPushInitialized

        public boolean isPushInitialized()
        Returns whether the push connection is initialized or not.
        Returns:
        true if initialized, false otherwise

      • addSymbolToPush

        public void addSymbolToPush​(java.lang.String symbol)
        Subscribe for push notifications for the given symbol.
        Parameters:
        symbol - the ticker symbol for which push notifications are requested

      • removeSymbolFromPush

        public void removeSymbolFromPush​(java.lang.String symbol)
        Stop push notifications for the given symbol.
        Parameters:
        symbol - the ticker symbol for which push notifications should be stopped

      • switchDataProvider

        public void switchDataProvider()
        Switch the active data provider to that which is currently set as active in the control's properties. The switch is actually done by setting the new active data provider in the properties; this method only makes sure that the change takes effect immediately and that the push subscriptions are moved to the new provider.

      • registerAlarmListener

        public java.util.ArrayList<ChartAlarm> registerAlarmListener​(IStockerDataListener listener,
                                                             java.lang.String symbol)
        Registers a listener and does some book keeping which enables to determine how many listeners there are for each symbol. A listener is usually a Watchlist or a StockerChart. Watchlists should register each each symbol they represent. StockerCharts represent only one symbol, so they need to register only once.
        Parameters:
        listener - the data listener
        symbol - the ticker symbol in which this listener is interested
        Returns:

      • unregisterAlarmListener

        public void unregisterAlarmListener​(IStockerDataListener listener,
                                    java.lang.String symbol)
        Unregister an alarm listener (usually a Watchlist or a StockerChart). To be called as soon as the listener is no longer interested in the symbol and does not need further alarm updates. Usually that is when the symbol has been removed from the watchlist or the the chart window has been closed.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener which is to be unregistered
        symbol - the symbol that this listeners was registered for

      • addAlarm

        public void addAlarm​(ChartAlarm ca,
                     java.lang.String symbol,
                     StockerChart submittingChart)
        Add an alarm. To be called from or for a StockerChart which has created the alarm. Other charts will be informed that a new alarm has been added.
        Parameters:
        ca - the alarm to be added
        symbol - the symbol that this alarm refers to
        submittingChart - the chart that is submitting this alarm (all other charts will receive an update that this alarm has been added)

      • removeAlarm

        public void removeAlarm​(java.lang.String symbol,
                        double value,
                        StockerChart submittingChart)
        Remove an alarm. To be called from or for a StockerChart which has removed the alarm. Other charts will be informed that the alarm has been removed.
        Parameters:
        symbol - the symbol for which an alarm should be removed
        value - the value of the alarm to be removed
        submittingChart - the chart that is submitting this alarm (all other charts will receive an update that this alarm has been removed)

      • clearAlarms

        public void clearAlarms​(java.lang.String symbol)
        Clear all alarms for one symbol. Only used for StockerTesterImpl.
        Parameters:
        symbol - the symbol for which the alarms should be cleared

      • clearAllAlarms

        public void clearAllAlarms()
        Clear all alarms for all symbols.

      • getAlarmsForSymbol

        public java.util.ArrayList<ChartAlarm> getAlarmsForSymbol​(java.lang.String symbol)
        Get all alarms for the specified symbol. Only used for StockerTesterImpl.
        Parameters:
        symbol - the symbol for which the alarms are requested

        Returns the alarm color as set in the properties

        public boolean getPropertyShowOnlyUSStocks()
        Returns whether the flag "showOnlyUSStocks" is set in the properties
        Returns:
